department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: large crescent-shaped shell pendant--irradescent with red substance in scratches, pits and crevices, and in small concave holes along top edge of pendant; some heavy accretions of red material on back of pendant along bottom edge; pendant attached to 1-3/4" wide knitted band (rust and brown) with flattened pompon at back of neck and cowrie shells near attachments at sides of pendant
title: Necklace
